description.zh: 咳嗽是一种常见的呼吸系统疾病，主要症状包括反复的咳嗽声，有时伴有痰。咳嗽可以由多种原因引起，包括感冒、流感、呼吸道感染、过敏、吸烟等。在中医中，治疗咳嗽往往需要辨证施治，根据咳嗽的具体类型（如风寒咳嗽、风热咳嗽等）来选择合适的草药。
description.en: Cough is a common respiratory disease characterized by repetitive coughing sounds, sometimes accompanied by phlegm. It can be caused by various factors, including colds, influenza, respiratory infections, allergies, smoking, etc. In traditional Chinese medicine (TCM), treatment for cough often requires diagnosis and treatment based on the specific type of cough (such as wind-cold cough, wind-heat cough, etc.), and appropriate herbs are selected accordingly.

effects.en: Clear heat and detoxify, moisten the lungs, and stop coughs
Blood supplementation and menstruation regulation, improve blood circulation
Improve blood circulation and vessel dilation
Clear heat, detoxify, calm the liver, and improve vision

effects.zh: 补血活血，适用于因气血虚弱引起的慢性咳嗽
effects.en: Blood-supplementing and circulation-improving effects, suitable for chronic coughs due to qi and blood deficiency

combination.zh: 丹参单独或与其他药材搭配
combination.en: Salvia Miltiorrhiza alone or in combination with other herbs

effects.zh: 改善血液循环，减轻咳嗽
effects.en: Improve blood circulation and alleviate coughing
